channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: What I’ve Learned After Running My Homelab for Nearly Five Years
item.dc:creator: Patrick Campanale
item.description: Sometimes a bigger homelab isn't always better.
item.content:encoded: Are you just getting into homelabbing? I’ve been doing it for nearly five years, and over that time, I’ve learned quite a lot. From learning to be satisfied with my own setup to figuring out what to self-host, here are a few key things I’ve learned from years of homelabbing to hopefully make your journey easier.

item.title: Google Quickly Copied an Unlikely iPhone 17 Add-on
item.dc:creator: Joe Fedewa
item.description: Google's $7 answer to Apple's latest accessory.
item.content:encoded: Everyone knows that tech companies love to steal ideas from each other. The iPhone has taken inspiration from Android countless times, and Samsung and Google have done the same to Apple. The most recent example is a little more unusual, though.

item.title: Google’s First Pixel 10 and 10 Pro Update Arrives
item.dc:creator: Cory Gunther
item.description: Software improvements and a fix for the fuzzy display bug.
item.content:encoded: If you bought a fancy new Google Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, or Pixel 10 Pro XL, you'll be happy to hear that Google's busy sending out its first big bug-fixing software update to improve your experience. While the phones receive new day-one software out of the box, this new September OTA is the first real update, and it's full of important changes.

item.title: Remembering Robert Redford—The Iconic Actor's 10 Best Movies
item.dc:creator: Mark McPherson
item.description: Remember Redford with these rousing roles from the late great acting legend.
item.content:encoded: Robert Redford has sadly passed away at the age of 89. He left behind a lasting legacy in acting, directing, and political activism. From founding film production companies to taking part in environmentalism, Redford has done so much, but he will perhaps be most remembered for his film roles.

item.title: This Is My Favorite Use of Custom Android Icons
item.dc:creator: Bertel King
item.description: It's not always about translucent glass or neon green.
item.content:encoded: Custom icon packs are not all created equal. Many, sadly, introduce more problems than they solve. But every now and then, I stumble upon an icon pack that feels like a genuine improvement rather than a mere taste of novelty. What sets these themes apart?

item.title: Top Tech Deals: Arlo Cameras, Mac Mini, Galaxy S25 Edge, and More
item.dc:creator: Cory Gunther
item.description: Get the jump on Amazon Prime Day with these deals.
item.content:encoded: Amazon just announced another Big Deals Day sale in October, and you know what that means. This week, we're already seeing several early Prime Day deals on all the hottest tech, from the 512GB Mac Mini, Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge, portable power banks, and much more.

item.title: PSA: You Can Use iPhone Widgets on a Mac
item.dc:creator: Joe Fedewa
item.description: Unleash the potential of your iPhone on your Mac desktop
item.content:encoded: Widgets are still a relatively new feature in macOS, and they probably don’t get the attention they deserve. For example, did you know you can have the same exact widgets from your iPhone on your Mac desktop?

item.title: These Samsung Galaxy Phones Will Not Get One UI 8 (Android 16)
item.dc:creator: Aman Kumar
item.description: You’ll need to stick with Android 15 if your device is on this list.
item.content:encoded: Android 16 is the latest version of the Android operating system. Unfortunately, not every Samsung smartphone will receive the Android 16 update in the form of One UI 8. Here's a list of Samsung Galaxy phones that will not get the update.

item.title: How to Compress and Extract Files Using the tar Command on Linux
item.dc:creator: Chris Hoffman
Jordan Gloor
item.description: Compressed Tarballs are the Linux-friendly cousin to the ZIP file.
item.content:encoded: The tar command on Linux is often used to create TAR.GZ or TGZ archive files, also called "tarballs." This command has a large number of options, but you just need to remember a few letters to quickly create archives with tar. The tar command can extract the resulting archives, too.

item.title: Sick of Gemini Reading Notifications Through Your Headphones? Here’s the Fix
item.dc:creator: Kabir Jain
item.description: Sometimes the smartest feature is the off switch.
item.content:encoded: I just got the new phone on the block—the Google Pixel 10. Setting it up was the usual smooth Pixel experience, until I noticed something different: a feature that lets Gemini read your notifications whenever you’ve got headphones on. It sounded helpful, so I thought, why not? I switched it on, figuring if it bugged me, I’d just turn it off later. Simple enough.
